mapper.insert: insert into user(email, passwordSalt, passwordHash, registerDate, mobPhone, statusFlag, lastAccess) values (#{email}, #{passwordSalt}, #{passwordHash}, #{registerDate}, #{mobPhone}, #{statusFlag}, #{lastAccess});
mapper.select: select id, email, passwordSalt, passwordHash, registerDate, mobPhone, statusFlag, lastAccess from user where id=#{id};
